title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Disaster Response Logistics Decision-Making Simulation: Game-Based Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic logistics management and disaster management processes, team collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop an optimal logistics distribution plan through stakeholder collaboration in disaster scenarios.
Learners make decisions that minimize casualties under resource-constrained conditions with over 80% accuracy.
In a simulation environment, learners can compare response strategies for three or more disaster types (e.g., typhoons, floods, earthquakes) and identify areas for improvement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
